movies.title: Pawn Sacrifice
movies.plot: American chess champion Bobby Fischer prepares for a legendary match-up against Russian Boris Spassky.

events.title: Regina Fischer tells Bobby that the FBI has her under surveillance
Bobby Fischer quits a chess tournament in Varna, Bulgaria
Bobby Fischer plays the first match against Boris Spassky
Bobby Fischer receives a standing ovation for his opening against Boris Spassky in game 6
